Title: Hood of Horror
Writer: Jacob Hair (story), Tim Sullivan (story), Jacob Hair, Tim Sullivan (story), Chris Kobin, Tim Sullivan, Jonathan McHugh (story), Jonathan McHugh, Jonathan McHugh (creator), Tim Sullivan (creator)
Actors: Snoop Dogg, Hawthorne James, Gabriel Pimentel, Irina Voronina
Plot: A hip hop horror anthology of three tales of terror told by the Hound of Hell that revolve around the residents of an inner-city neighborhood whose actions determine where they will go in the afterlife.
